Question
========

You simultaneously throw up three pure coins. Define the event *A* as: at least 2 heads are on top. How many outcomes belong to event *A*?

Answerlist
----------

* 2
* 4
* 6
* 8

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 2: Incorrect
* 4: Correct
* 6: Incorrect
* 8: Incorrect
